subject: Re: Simsonn x Sim it studios collaboration proposal
description_text:
Hi!

Out of curiosity, are these shipped yet?


Med vänlig hälsning
Alex Reinholdsson 
+46(0)738 - 24 33 88

> 12 aug. 2025 kl. 14:16 skrev General and sales enquiries <service@simsonn.com>:
> 
> possible.

conversations.body_text: Hi Alexander Reinholdsson,    The goods in our German warehouse are expected to arrive around the 25th. We will ship them to you from the German warehouse at that time, as we are concerned about potential taxes and fees if we ship from China, although the likelihood of this is very low. If you don't mind, we can ship them to you immediately from China, and they should arrive around the 25th.

That is fine, ship so u ha e them here asap:) 
The taxes is also going to be fairly low due to the price ??if it gets caught I mean!

Best regards
Alex

We will ship them to you from the German warehouse at that time, as we are concerned about potential taxes and fees if we ship from China, although the likelihood of this is very low. If you don't mind, we can ship them to you immediately from China, and they should arrive around the 25th.
> 
>

Hello, this is your logistics tracking number. However, our warehouse has reported that all Pro X Ultra products have been shipped to overseas warehouses and are currently out of stock. They will arrive on Monday. If the German warehouse also receives the shipment on Monday, we will change the shipping destination to the German warehouse for you.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/sc/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3231420731523

Hi!

Okay I see, then we will see when it arrives :)

Best regards
Alex Reinholdsson

Hi Alexander Reinholdsson,    Apologies, our German warehouse only received the goods today. We dispatched your order from China on Monday. Here is your tracking link.  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF3231420731523

Okay perfect.

So they will send it today or tomorrow then I suppose?
From where is the haptics shipped? 


Med vänlig hälsning

Hello, the package was shipped from China, and haptics are included in the order. There are two packages in total. Additionally, I noticed the package is currently awaiting customs clearance. Please be aware that you may provide our chat records to customs as proof that the products are intended for filming and promotional purposes.

Hi!

Customs is still holding my package and. asking for proof of payment, been
sending our email out. Still didnt receive the german package tho?

On Thu, Aug 28, 2025 at 8:33 AM service@simsonn.com

Hello, you will need to cooperate with customs to complete clearance. You may provide our chat records as evidence that the goods are intended for filming and promotional purposes.  Although our German warehouse now holds stock, we cannot abandon this shipment as it represents significant value. We hope you understand. We understand the difficulties you've encountered; customs clearance is indeed a troublesome process. That's precisely why we've been waiting for the German warehouse to replenish stock before shipping to you. I hadn't anticipated matters becoming so complicated. Nevertheless, please persist in contacting customs, my friend. Wishing you every success.

Yeah I’m not asking to abandon shipment but you were also shipping the other pedal set from Germany, the pro one I mean. 

That way I can at least start with one before the plus is coming 

Med vänlig hälsning
Alex Reinholdsson 
+46(0)738 - 24 33 88
